医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
牛皮癣与特应性皮炎：新研究揭示了特定年龄组中令人惊讶的炎症差异特应性皮炎和银屑病患者的血液学参数和炎症和免疫的血清生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Psoriasis-vs-atopic-dermatitis-New-study-reveals-surprising-炎症-differences-in-age-specific-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Psoriasis-vs-atopic-dermatitis-New-study-reveals-surprising-炎症-differences-in-age-specific-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13fbf806-e679-48c7-905b-9af2c33039c9 Tue, 12 Sep 2023 03:58:00 -0400 Psoriasis vs. atopic dermatitis: New study reveals surprising inflammatory differences in age-specific groups
接触感染或自身免疫性疾病与痴呆症发病率相关吗？医院发现的感染、自身免疫性疾病和痴呆症发病之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Is-exposure-to-infections-or-autoimmune-diseases- Associated-with-dementia-incidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230912/Is-exposure-to-infections-or-autoimmune-diseases- Associated-with-dementia-incidence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1dcc65e8-3627-401d-8c52-e592e08c0ecd Tue, 12 Sep 2023 03:25:00 -0400 Is exposure to infections or autoimmune diseases associated with dementia incidence?
加拿大慢性阻塞性肺病住院人数急剧上升，尤其是年轻女性根据 CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）的最新研究，自 2002 年以来，加拿大每年因慢性阻塞性肺疾病 (COPD) 入院的人数增加了 69%，尤其是女性和 65 岁以下人群 https://www.cmaj.ca/查找/doi/10.1503/cmaj.221051。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/COPD-hospitalizations-rising-sharply-in-Canada-special-among-younger-females.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/COPD-hospitalizations-rising-sharply-in-Canada-special-among-younger-females.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92edf962-44c2-4f0e-8aa8-2385609ea112 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 23:09:42 -0400 COPD hospitalizations rising sharply in Canada, especially among younger females
新的机器学习算法可以帮助优化下一代治疗抗体抗体治疗或许能够激活免疫系统来对抗帕金森氏症、阿尔茨海默氏症和结直肠癌等疾病，但当它们与自身和其他非疾病标志分子结合时，其效果就会较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/New-machine-learning-algorithms-can-help-optimize-the-next- Generation-of-therapeutic-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/New-machine-learning-algorithms-can-help-optimize-the-next- Generation-of-therapeutic-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a372712a-83bf-4fbd-a835-d50a804fadbd Mon, 11 Sep 2023 23:01:47 -0400 New machine-learning algorithms can help optimize the next-generation of therapeutic antibodies
健康的生活方式可以预防抑郁症吗？一项开创性的研究表明，无论遗传倾向如何，保持健康的生活方式（包括良好的睡眠、社交联系和定期锻炼）都可以显着降低患抑郁症的风险。该研究强调，生活方式的选择可能比遗传对抑郁风险的影响更大，这为预防提供了可行的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Can-a-healthy-lifestyle-keep-depression-at-bay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Can-a-healthy-lifestyle-keep-depression-at-bay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a8df8f3-c9b4-4286-92d0-47d0dc9b73b4 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 22:52:00 -0400 Can a healthy lifestyle keep depression at bay?
有效治疗下尿路症状可降低老年男性的死亡风险美国泌尿外科协会官方期刊《泌尿学杂志》十月号上的一项研究报告称，对 50 岁或以上男性的下尿路症状 (LUTS) 进行有效治疗可降低未来几年的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Effective-treatment-for-lower-urinary-tract-symptoms-linked-to-lower-mortality-risk-in-older-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Effective-treatment-for-lower-urinary-tract-symptoms-linked-to-lower-mortality-risk-in-older-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dd1f136-9fc4-4545-9f1f-46cd8762ebf6 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 22:51:57 -0400 Effective treatment for lower urinary tract symptoms linked to lower mortality risk in older men
抗抑郁药可以减少负面记忆，改善抑郁症患者的记忆莱斯大学的新研究发现，抗抑郁药实际上可以减少抑郁症患者的负面记忆，同时改善整体记忆功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Antidepressants-may-reduce-negative-memories-improve-memory-in-depressed-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Antidepressants-may-reduce-negative-memories-improve-memory-in-depressed-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17076f21-8f92-4f7d-8c15-0eb1749200a2 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 22:42:41 -0400 Antidepressants may reduce negative memories, improve memory in depressed individuals
夜猫子患糖尿病的风险更高吗？布莱根妇女医院的一项研究显示，即使考虑到生活方式因素，夜猫子患糖尿病的风险比早起的人高出 19%。该研究强调了睡眠模式对糖尿病风险的重要性，并表明更加个性化的工作安排可能是有益的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Are-night-owls-at-higher-risk-for-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Are-night-owls-at-higher-risk-for-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=518fdbd3-85d8-4e6a-ae88-636ab139e7b6 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 22:37:00 -0400 Are night owls at higher risk for diabetes?
居住在高颗粒物水平地区的女性乳腺癌发病率增加美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员发现，生活在颗粒物空气污染程度较高的地区与乳腺癌发病率增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Increased-breast-cancer-incidence-among-women-living-in-areas-with-high-pativity-matter-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Increased-breast-cancer-incidence-among-women-living-in-areas-with-high-pativity-matter-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=519f2be6-e587-4e41-9186-b02a9e768db6 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 22:35:32 -0400 Increased breast cancer incidence among women living in areas with high particulate matter levels
你的糖修复如何影响你的维生素：添加糖和营养摄入之间令人惊讶的联系研究调查了美国成年人从各种饮料中摄入的添加糖与营养充足之间的关系，结果表明软饮料中较高的添加糖与营养摄入不足有关。相比之下，果汁饮料、调味牛奶和其他饮食来源中添加的糖可能有助于实现营养充足的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/How-your-sugar-fix-affects-your-vitamins-Surprising-link- Between-added-sugar-and- Nutrition-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/How-your-sugar-fix-affects-your-vitamins-Surprising-link- Between-added-sugar-and- Nutrition-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5445d13a-bb77-492f-b932-363583ad01cc Mon, 11 Sep 2023 21:23:00 -0400 How your sugar fix affects your vitamins: Surprising link between added sugar and nutrient intake
